resources.string: A search bar allows you to search right away for whatever song, album or artist you have in mind at the moment, searching not just through your own library, but through the entire music store (not implemented). On the main screen also appear suggestions for new, popular or recommended music to be found in the store. Clicking on any of the suggested items brings you into a sub-activity of the MUSIC STORE parent activity (not implemented). If you click one of the items in the category \'Recently Purchased\', you can browse the album tracks (implemented).

This tabbed activity allows you to browse the music library by artist, album or song. If you click a particular artist, you see all the albums by that artist contained in your library. If you click a particular album, you see all the songs contained in that album. If you click a particular song, a screen containing the song details is opened.
It shows the list of albums by the selected artist contained in your library. If you click any of the albums, you can browse the songs contained in that album.
It shows the list of songs contained in the selected album. Clicking any of the songs starts the activity PLAY SINGLE.

It shows the list of songs contained in the selected album. Clicking any of the songs starts the activity PLAY ALBUM TRACK. At the bottom of the screen, a button brings you back to the ARTIST screen from which you came.
It shows the song details and has an embedded media player (not implemented). Clicking the album cover, extra media-player controls are provided in a toggle view.

It shows the song details and has an embedded media player (not implemented). Clicking the album cover, extra media-player controls are provided in a toggle view. At the bottom of the screen, a button brings you back to the ALBUM or ALBUM FROM ARTIST screen from which you came.
